section1.paragraph: The data-driven solution to discover the secrets of tourism in Abruzzo
section1.label: Start

section2.title: About Nomad
section2.paragraph: Nomad is Outlander's tourism-related solution for exploring the Abruzzo region like never before. It monitors tourist flows from official ISTAT datasets, providing statistics and future forecasts based on a trained Machine Learning model.
section2.label: Read more

section3.title: Use your data
section3.paragraph: Interested in applying Nomad to your data? Upload your CSV or download and fill in our template for a comprehensive and flexible tourism trend analysis.
section3.label: Upload your own file

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.paragraph1: Once you have uploaded your CSV we will check that the data are valid and correctly formatted. If they are not, follow the instructions to edit the necessary fields.
instructions.paragraph2: If you prefer, you can download this fillable template:

introduction.paragraph: Charting a new course in the digital realm

div1.title: WHO WE ARE
div1.paragraph1: Outlander is a web agency in Turin specialising in the creation of cutting-edge sites and web applications.
div1.paragraph2: The company was born from a team of developers and designers determined to transform their passions into solutions for individuals and companies, conceived one by one with creativity and an out-of-the-box approach.
div1.paragraph3: The word outlander conjures up the idea of an exploration into innovative solutions, created to satisfy the customer and accompany him or her on a voyage of discovery into the digital frontier.

div2.title: OUR FOCUS
div2.paragraph1: We deal with web solutions for individuals and companies related to the tourism sector.
div2.paragraph2: Our focus encompasses innovation and User Experience, and with these pillars we offer tailor-made solutions to meet customer needs.
div2.paragraph3: All Outlander projects and solutions include careful UX and UI analysis, Mobile First development and SEO optimisation.

div3.title: OUR TECHNOLOGIES
div3.paragraph1: A journey of discovery into the digital age, guided by innovative technology and experience.

div4.paragraph1: It is our latest project, a web application that allows the user to explore the Abruzzo region like never before.
div4.paragraph2: Analysing ISTAT datasets, NOMAD creates interactive graphs that provide the user with a detailed look at the flow of tourists, both Italian and foreign, and their choices, from the type of accommodation to the most popular provinces. NOMAD is the ideal solution that guarantees reliability and correctness of data.
div4.paragraph3: Moreover, with a trained machine learning model, NOMAD proposes a series of short-, medium- and long-term forecasts of future tourist flows, ensuring an accuracy of up to five years.
div4.paragraph4: With its user-friendly interface and ability to analyse complex data, NOMAD is the perfect tool to fully discover Abruzzo.
